description: This file implements a stub platform-specific Ethernet switch control interface, providing functions to get/set port status, configuration, admin status, and device location by MAC address. It serves as an abstraction layer for Ethernet switch hardware, with placeholder logic returning simulated or fixed responses.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwInit(void)
methods.description: Initializes the Ethernet switch hardware abstraction; currently a placeholder returning success.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwGetPortStatus(CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_PORT PortId,PCCSP_HAL_ETHSW_LINK_RATE pLinkRate,PCCSP_HAL_ETHSW_DUPLEX_MODE pDuplexMode,PCCSP_HAL_ETHSW_LINK_STATUS pStatus)
methods.description: Retrieves current status (link speed, duplex mode, link state) for a specified port, returning fixed values for supported ports.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwGetPortCfg(CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_PORT PortId,PCCSP_HAL_ETHSW_LINK_RATE pLinkRate,PCCSP_HAL_ETHSW_DUPLEX_MODE pDuplexMode)
methods.description: Retrieves current port configuration (link speed and duplex mode), providing preset values based on port ID.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwSetPortCfg(CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_PORT PortId,CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_LINK_RATE LinkRate,CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_DUPLEX_MODE DuplexMode)
methods.description: Sets port configuration (link speed and duplex mode), with placeholder logic that always succeeds.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwGetPortAdminStatus(CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_PORT PortId,PCCSP_HAL_ETHSW_ADMIN_STATUS pAdminStatus)
methods.description: Retrieves administrative status (up, down, test) of a port, returning fixed statuses for each port.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwSetPortAdminStatus(CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_PORT PortId,CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_ADMIN_STATUS AdminStatus)
methods.description: Sets the admin status of a port, placeholder implementation that always succeeds.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwSetAgingSpeed(CCSP_HAL_ETHSW_PORT PortId,INT AgingSpeed)
methods.description: Sets aging speed for a port, currently a stub that always returns success.

methods.name: INT CcspHalEthSwLocatePortByMacAddress(unsigned char * pMacAddr,INT * pPortId)
methods.description: Finds the port associated with a given MAC address, returning a fixed port (EthPort4).

methods.name: INT CcspHalExtSw_getAssociatedDevice(ULONG * output_array_size,eth_device_t ** output_struct)
methods.description: Retrieves associated device information, placeholder function returning success.
